0:
until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Waiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done

version: 2
global:
  private_key: /etc/dendrite/matrix_key.pem
  server_name: "${SECRET_PUBLIC_DOMAIN}"
  well_known_server_name: "dendrite.${SECRET_PUBLIC_DOMAIN}:443"
  well_known_client_name: "https://dendrite.${SECRET_PUBLIC_DOMAIN}:443"
  database:
    connection_string: postgresql://dendrite:${SECRET_DENDRITE_DB_PASSWD}@postgresql/dendrite?sslmode=disable
  cache:
    max_size_estimated: 600mb
  report_stats:
      enabled: true
  jetstream:
    storage_path: "/jetstream"
media_api:
  base_path: /media
client_api:
  registration_shared_secret: "${SECRET_DENDRITE_REGISTRATION_SHARED_SECRET}"
mscs:
  mscs:
    - msc2836 # Threading
    - msc2946 # Spaces
    - msc2444 # Peeking over federation
    - msc2753 # Peeking via sync
sync_api:
  search:
    enabled: true
    base_path: /search
    language: "en"
logging:
  - type: std
    level: debug

username=`grep -B 1 'username:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && password=`grep -B 1 'password:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && curl --fail $username:$password@localhost:3030/triggers/manual

username=`grep -B 1 'username:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && password=`grep -B 1 'password:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && curl --fail $username:$password@localhost:3030/triggers/manual
